sentence.Network_en: While so preoccupied, he forgot his usual cautiousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这么乱想的时候, 他忘了素日的谨慎.

sentence.Network_en: They always trusted in his cautiousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对他办事谨慎一向是信赖的.

sentence.Network_en: We always trust in her cautiousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对她办事谨慎一向是信赖的.
